name: UnofficialCountdownto2018NFLKickoff
0:
”Alexa, open football scheduler”
”Alexa, ask football scheduler how long until kickoff”
”Alexa, ask football scheduler how far away is kickoff in days”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: football scheduler
des: Cant wait until the week 1 kickoff in Philadelphia? Neither can we! This skill will tell you how long until that glorious day.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
